biotools.summary: The APHIRM Toolkit is a set of OHS risk management procedures that target both physical and psychosocial hazards. A participative hazard identification and risk management toolkit for improving the risk management of musculoskeletal disorders.

bioschemas.name: APHIRM toolkit
